this_title: Love Death and Everything in Between
introduction: Mira and Pradeep are grieving parents who've unexpectedly lost their son. In order to pack his belongings they visit his house in London. During their short stay they experience is life vicariously while navigating the ups and downs in their relationship as they are mourning in their own ways. Pradeep is practical where as Mira is more unstable. She meets their son's lover Aubrey who is suffering from survivor's guilt, they both bond over their emotional trauma and longing for their dead son/lover. Soon the trio realizes that they have to come to terms with his death in order to make way for healing. Though they cannot overcome the grief of his death, they start to build their lives around it.
